name: The Horde Needs More Lean Wolf Steaks!
tooltip:
The Horde Needs More Lean Wolf Steaks!

As you can see, <class>, we still need to pack away more food for the soldiers. I don't know if you've ever been in a war before, but once you get past the initial shock of the battlefield, you can get pretty hungry.  You did a good job last time, so I expect that you'll do as well, if not a little quicker, in getting me another stack of those lean wolf steaks.

Requirements:
- Lean Wolf Steak x 20
